summary: The client requested a new sprint plan after previous ones were deleted, and the Sprint Planning Architect proposed SP-001 focusing on US-006 (Basic Authentication) and US-008 (Supabase Backend Integration) as foundational stories, seeking approval to proceed.

actions.task: Approve, tweak, or provide feedback on the proposed Sprint SP-001 plan

backlog_deltas.title: Proposed sprint with US-006 and US-008 as foundational stories

risks.risk: Assumption that previous auth and backend work needs re-execution due to deletions, potentially leading to redundant effort
risks.mitigation: Verify current status of US-006 and US-008 before execution and adjust plan if partially complete

risks.risk: Sprint exceeding 20-minute execution time if dependencies arise
risks.mitigation: Prioritize zero-dependency stories and monitor time during execution
